game_description: Human Tag is still in very early development and has gorilla tag's movement but with a man named Kyle, (Kyle lost his legs as a little boy and has adapted his movement to his arms) Joing the official discord server for updates and announcments! https://discord.gg/cWpJjkQ7
review_1: This game seems fun from the reviews except for 2, one says it’s “barren” he just means he’s lonely and he doesn’t have friends. Moral of the story, get friends.😎👍🏻😃😁😆😄😃😀😂🤣🙂🙃😊😊🤗🤗🤗🤗👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻✌🏻
review_2: This is so cool so try it out please do not get mad it’s just a game so if you do go and play a different game so do not a cat and delete the game
review_5: this game is ok. it is kinda cool and kinda weird but overall its a pretty cool game.
